root.name: FIFA Soccer 06
root.description: Game Modes:Road to FIFA World Cup:Pick Your Favorite National Team and start from beginning to end qualify and playing in the World Cup.Choose the teams you face in qualify rounds.Following your ranking in real time.Manage Your Team with substitutions, team formations, and other various tactics.Various unlockable items and teams are available by collecting 'Road Points' during games.Create Tournament:Pick one or several teams and compete in a group, knock out or pure knockout tournament.Control one or several teams in a single tournament.Practice Mode:Practice a certain type of play (free kick, penalty, corner) until its perfected.Set various numbers of players to practice odd-man chances or hone your defensive skills.Online PlayCompete against others either using PSN or Xbox Live online services.Compete in either Ranked or Unranked matches.Meet other FIFA fans and players in the Lobby, you can chat and set up matches.Check the Leaderboards to see what place in the world you stand.NEW features to the gameThere is a budget in manager mode. Manual set pieces. Online play. tricks.
